title: Downgrade to Android 10 from Android 11
content:
I regret upgrading to Android 11. ever since the upgrade, i have the following issues.
1. The phone is heating up a lot.
2. Has graphics issues; Whenever I close any app, it has a graphics delay and I see the name of the app on the top screen and then it flashes and closes.When I play a game, I can clearly notice pixels in the game, which was really fluid when I was using Android 11.
3. Sometimes I see a weird small toastr popup that says "null".
